languages.text: "Ты прав{mf||а}, элантах. Бедное создание страдает во тьме уже долгое время".

traits.locale_text: "Ты прав{mf||а}, элантах. Бедное создание страдает во тьме уже долгое время".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "You are right, elantach. The poor thing has been suffering in the dark for a very long time."
languages.original_text: "Ты прав{mf||а}, элантах. Бедное создание страдает во тьме уже долгое время".

traits.locale_text: "You are right, elantach. The poor thing has been suffering in the dark for a very long time."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You are right, elantach. The poor thing has been suffering in the dark for a very long time."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You are right, elantach. The poor thing has been suffering in the dark for a very long time."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You are right, elantach. The poor thing has been suffering in the dark for a very long time."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You are right, elantach. The poor thing has been suffering in the dark for a very long time."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「お前の言うとおりだ、エランタ。気の毒に、この子は長い間暗闇の中で苦しんでいたのだろう」
languages.original_text: "You are right, elantach. The poor thing has been suffering in the dark for a very long time."

traits.locale_text: 「お前の言うとおりだ、エランタ。気の毒に、この子は長い間暗闇の中で苦しんでいたのだろう」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Tienes razón, elantach. Esta pobre criatura lleva mucho tiempo sufriendo en las sombras».
languages.original_text: "You are right, elantach. The poor thing has been suffering in the dark for a very long time."

traits.locale_text: «Tienes razón, elantach. Esta pobre criatura lleva mucho tiempo sufriendo en las sombras».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “你说得对，外界人。这株可怜的植物已经在黑暗中受了太久的苦。”
languages.original_text: "You are right, elantach. The poor thing has been suffering in the dark for a very long time."

traits.locale_text: “你说得对，外界人。这株可怜的植物已经在黑暗中受了太久的苦。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Vous avez raison, elantach. Cette pauvre chose a suffisamment souffert dans l'obscurité. »
languages.original_text: "You are right, elantach. The poor thing has been suffering in the dark for a very long time."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez raison, elantach. Cette pauvre chose a suffisamment souffert dans l'obscurité. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr habt recht, Elantach. Das arme Ding leidet schon sehr lange in der Dunkelheit."
languages.original_text: "You are right, elantach. The poor thing has been suffering in the dark for a very long time."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt recht, Elantach. Das arme Ding leidet schon sehr lange in der Dunkelheit."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Haklısın elantach. Zavallım kaç zamandır karanlıkta ızdırap içinde."
languages.original_text: "You are right, elantach. The poor thing has been suffering in the dark for a very long time."
